headline: RetinalGenix Technologies Contracts with LabCorp to Support DNA/GPS Platform for Advanced Genetic and Retinal Health Screening
summary: Cost-Efficient Methodology Aims To Reduce Reliance On Expensive Diagnostic Procedures Such As MRI, CT Scans, PET Scans, and EchocardiogramsAPOLLO BEACH, Fla., June 27, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- RetinalGenix Technologies Inc. OTCQB:RTGN (“RetinalGenix” or the “Company”), a pioneering developmental-stage company focused on ophthalmic screening, monitoring, pharmacogenetic mapping, and repurposed drug development for early detection and treatment of eye and systemic diseases, has entered into an agr
